meanings.sent1: The superhero's special suit made him invulnerable to any kind of harm.
meanings.sent2: The ancient castle was invulnerable to the strongest storms.
meanings.sent3: The little turtle felt invulnerable hiding in its shell.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him made her feel invulnerable to any pain.
meanings.sent5: The diamond's hardness made it invulnerable to scratches.

meanings.sent1: The fortress was built to be invulnerable to enemy attacks.
meanings.sent2: The powerful shield made the warrior invulnerable in battle.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted invulnerable when faced with a tiny mouse.
meanings.sent4: His confidence made him seem invulnerable to any criticism.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was invulnerable to the passage of time.
